Token.Abstract:
The object mapper is responsible for mapping objects from a NSDictionary sourcce to an instance of a registered class. Every registered class should conforms to the AGRestObjectMapping protocol. An object mapper should be registered to the AGRestCoordinator in order to be used, note that only one mapper can be registered at a time.

The AGRestCoordinator will use his object mapper to automatically map server's responses to registered classes instances and attach those into request responses.
YES if the class can be registered to the object mapper. No otherwise.

ReturnValue.Abstract: YES if the class can be registered to the object mapper. No otherwise.

Token.Abstract: Map a source dictionary to an instance of a registered class.

Parameter.Name: error
Parameter.Abstract: The error, if any, which occured during the mapping.

ReturnValue.Abstract: The mapped object/array instance(s) of the targetClass.

Token.Abstract: Unmap an instance of a registered class to a source dictionary.

Parameter.Name: error
Parameter.Abstract: The error, if any, which occured during the unmapping.

ReturnValue.Abstract: The source dictionary from the given object.

Token.Abstract: Unmap an array of registered class to a source dictionary.

Parameter.Name: objects
Parameter.Abstract: The array of instances of registered class.

Parameter.Name: error
Parameter.Abstract: The error, if any, which occured during the unmapping.

ReturnValue.Abstract: The source dictionary from the given array.

Token.Abstract: Register a class that conforms to AGObjectMappingProtocol as a valid mappable/unmapple class. Registering a class will make this class ready for mapping/unmapping operations. Under the hood, registering a class will try to instanciate an object of this class and call AGObjectMapping configuration methods.

ReturnValue.Abstract: YES if a class has been registered. NO otherwise.

Token.Abstract: All registered subclasses of AGObject or NSManagedObject

ReturnValue.Abstract: All registered subclasses of AGObject or NSManagedObject

Token.Abstract: YES if the class is already registred. No otherwise.

ReturnValue.Abstract: YES if the class is already registred. No otherwise.
